title.value: Продуктивность коров при введении в рацион добавки 'Микс-Оптима К'
Efficiency of cows at introduction in a diet of the additive 'Mix-Optima K'
Efficiency of cows at introduction in a diet of the additive 'Mix-Optima K'

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Frolova, L.M., Grodno State Agrarian Univ. (Belarus)

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented data on studying the influence of the enzymatic and protein additive 'Mix-Optima K' (containing mixture of protein concentrated feedstuff with enzymatic preparations referring to hydrolyzing enzyme class, as well as with the additives in the form of wheat and rye bran, and chalkstone) on dairy efficiency of cows. Inclusion of the given additive in diet structure (2% on weight of mixed fodder) allows to raise dairy efficiency on 1,8-3,4 kg or 11,3-19,0%. Research of blood indicators testifies about activation of exchange processes in an organism and the best use of diet nutrients by cows of killed group. Use in diets of milk cows of the enzymatic and protein additive 'Mix-Optima K' reduces the cost price of milk and positive impact on efficiency of branch of cattle breeding makes. The recoupment of additional expenses makes 3,39-3,53.
